iaik.pdf.itext

Class MakeSignatureIAIK

  • java.lang.Object
    • iaik.pdf.itext.MakeSignatureIAIK

  • public class MakeSignatureIAIK
extends java.lang.Object
    Signs given PDF documents. Alternative implementation to com.itextpdf.text.pdf.security.MakeSignature using IAIK for handling message digest, signature values, CMS signature, OCSP request and time stamp.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MakeSignatureIAIK()

      Sign the given PDF, saving the signed PDF to given destination.

    • Method Detail

      • signDetached

        public static void signDetached(java.lang.String src,
                                java.lang.String dest,
                                java.security.cert.Certificate[] chain,
                                java.security.PrivateKey pk,
                                java.lang.String digestAlgorithm,
                                com.itextpdf.text.pdf.security.MakeSignature.CryptoStandard subfilter,
                                java.lang.String reason,
                                java.lang.String location,
                                java.util.Collection<com.itextpdf.text.pdf.security.CrlClient> crlList,
                                boolean useOCSP,
                                java.lang.String tsaUrl,
                                java.lang.String tsaUser,
                                java.lang.String tsaPw,
                                int estimatedSize)
                         throws java.security.GeneralSecurityException,
                                java.io.IOException,
                                PdfSignatureException
        Sign the given PDF, saving the signed PDF to given destination.
        Parameters:
        src - path to the PDF document, that shall be signed
        dest - path, where the signed PDF document shall be saved
        chain - certificates corresponding to given private key
        pk - private key, that shall be used for signing the document
        digestAlgorithm - digest algorithm for digesting document bytes
        subfilter - signature subfilter, specifying the signature format
        reason - reason of signature process
        location - location of signature process
        crlList - CRLs that shall be included in the signature
        useOCSP - true, if OCSP response shall be included in the signature
        tsaUrl - set to TSA URL,if timestamp shall be added to signature, null otherwise
        tsaUser - username to authenticate at TSA
        tsaPw - password to authenticate at TSA
        estimatedSize - bytes that shall be reserved for the encoded signature
        Throws:
        java.security.GeneralSecurityException - in case of problems during handling certificates or CRLs
        java.io.IOException - if PDF document can't be read
        PdfSignatureException - if PDF signature can't be created
